message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.IT, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with image filtering and processing, which is a core topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed Side Window Filtering (SWF) technique is applicable to a wide range of filtering algorithms, including linear and nonlinear filters, and can improve their edge preserving capabilities. This makes it relevant to graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM) as well. The paper also discusses the theoretical basis of the SWF technique, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG) concepts.
